summary: Denrik\'s Barrow adds a completely new Nordic barrow located at riding distance from Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
Denrik\'s Barrow is my first attempt of creating my very own dungeon. My hope is that you will find it both entertaining and challenging.

To locate the barrow simply follow the river passing Riverwood south to the big lake and search the surrounding area of the lake. The entrance can be seen from the beach.

The dungeon contains challenging fights, ambushes, traps, a custom armor/weapon set, secret paths and puzzles for you to solve.

---- Denrik\'s Barrow v.08 Fixes ----
Cheers for all the feedback and bug reports! The more bug reports I get the easier I have to find them and fix them! :)
- Redid the lightning of the tomb to make it more dark.
- Reduced the amount of existing torches.
- All Draugrs should now be lootable.
- Stormblade will now have more appropiate stats and damage output.
- Random fixes and tweaks.

---- Denrik’s Barrow v.09 Fixes ----
So, I’ve finally added a dungeon quest. It will now have a unique quest that you can pick up from Falkreath! Keep posting feedback! 
-	Fixed a few NAVmesh issues that prevented enemies to reach certain places.
-	Added a unique Dungeon Quest “Tome of Stormblade”
-	Placed a quest NPC somewhere in Falkreath to grants you the quest “Tome of Stormblade”.
-	Added more potions by request.
-	Random fixes and tweaks.
Known Bugs
-	Companions/Followers can’t enter, This is caused by a NAVmesh problem outside the dungeon, I’m working to solve it.
 
If you enjoyed my dungeon, post a comment, give feedback and feel free to endorse me :)

Also, feel free to post a comment and rate it on Steamworkshop also!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13443

Special Thanks to;
Best in Slot
Maddox911
Tobask
Linde
Inkagnito
author: VonSnoe
